name: Destruction Carnival
description:
Destruction Carnival is an action game in which we will face endless hordes of relentless enemies .

The game mechanics are very simple and can be summed up perfectly in the phrase: "Kill everything that moves in a closed setting, "and that's really the only goal of the game. To achieve this you use all the weapons that appear from time to time to kill as many enemies as possible and then pass to the next level.

Among the weapons that will help you move forward and face stronger and stronger enemies are a laser rifle, a plasma shotgun , missiles, bombs, a canon, and some other more. All of them will appear randomly on the stage, so you must be very attentive and always ready.
